Good quality. Spacious and light weight.
Got the pouch delivered today. Found the product same as per the description. Have spacious compartment and zip is steady and smooth. Guess, good for the price.
Lightweight and has lots of space. Looks very sleek. Complete value for money.

After repeated bad experiences with online shopping I was literally disheartened and could never dare to shop online but I was forced to buy this by my cousin and was extremely extremely happy and joyful seeing the quality of the material finishing of the stitches I am just loving it I got exactly what I wanted after ages.A brand level product
